title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions: Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop! This revolutionary cleaning tool is designed to make your life easier by seamlessly transitioning from vacuuming to mopping, all in one go. With a rotating brush system and a wide cleaning path, it effortlessly tackles dirt and grime on hard floors and area rugs. The cordless design allows for up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning, and the improved edge cleaning ensures every nook and cranny is spotless. Plus, with the BISSELL Pet Foundation as the supported cause, you can feel good about your purchase. Don't miss out on this game-changing cleaning solution!

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop in sleek black, model 2554A. This innovative cleaning powerhouse isn't just a vacuum - it's a revolution in home cleaning. With its rotating brush system, swivel head, and 10.5-inch cleaning path width, you can effortlessly tackle tough messes on hard floors and area rugs.

This cordless wonder features a 36V Lithium-Ion battery that provides up to 30 minutes of cleaning time, so you can clean your entire home without stopping to recharge. And with its improved edge cleaning and self-cleaning cycle, you'll achieve a level of clean you never thought possible.

But that's not all - the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max also supports a great cause. With every purchase, you'll be supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, making a positive impact on the lives of animals in need.

Plus, with included accessories like Multi-Surface Trial Formulas and Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, you'll have everything you need to get started right out of the box.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to revolutionize your cleaning routine and make a difference in the lives of pets in need. Get your BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max today!

With its multi-surface cleaning capabilities and included accessories, such as trial formulas and brush rolls, this all-in-one cleaner is a game-changer for your home. Don't miss out on the opportunity to simplify your cleaning routine and support a great cause with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max!

For a limited time, it comes with 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls, giving you everything you need to achieve a deep clean. Don't miss out on this all-in-one cleaning solution that gives back to a good cause. Upgrade your cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop today!
